params.newOwner: The address of the new owner of the publication

returns._0: newPublicationId The identifier for the new version of the publication

params.citations: An array of `Citation`s for this publication
params.contributors: An array of `Contribution`s for this publication
params.fixedSellPrice: If this publication is to be sold at a fixed price, the price that has been set
params.maxNumberOfLicences: The total number of licenses allowed to be in force at a given time
params.ownerAddress: The blockchain address of the user performing the upload
params.pricingStrategy: a PricingStrategy enum specifying how licenses will be sold for this publication
params.publicationUri: the IPFS address of the uploaded paper

returns._0: publicationId Unique identifier for the newly created publication

params.citations: An array of `Citation`s for this publication. An empty array will cause there to be no changes.
params.contributors: An array of `Contribution`s for this publication. An empty array will cause there to be no changes.
params.fixedSellPrice: If this publication is to be sold at a fixed price, the price that has been set. A value of type(uint256).max indicates the value should be unchanged
params.maxNumberOfLicences: The total number of licenses allowed to be in force at a given time. A value of type(uint256).max indicates the value should be unchanged
params.pricingStrategy: a PricingStrategy enum specifying how licenses will be sold for this publication. NULL indicates the value should be unchanged.
params.publicationUri: the IPFS address of the uploaded paper. An empty string indicates the value should be unchanged.

returns._0: newPublicationId The identifier for the new version of the publication.

_changeOwner(uint256,address).notice: Replaces a publication with a new version, with a change in ownership

_replacePublication(uint256,uint8,string.notice: Creates a new version of a publication, and marks the old version as replaced
